duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and lead the strategic direction for all aspects of safety and environmental programs to ensure compliance with all Federal, State, and Local laws and regulations.
Oversee the safety functions across all business units and partner with department leaders to implement strategic safety initiatives.
Develop and oversee the North America Hazardous Waste program, including proper handling and removal.
Manage a team of EHS Managers and/or EHS Specialists to further advance safety culture and alignment across sites.
Act as a key advisor on EH&S matters to stakeholders including operations, human resources, claims, compliance, etc.
Responsible for incident investigation programs company-wide for serious occupational health and safety events.
Ensure timely and accurate reporting of required regulatory submissions.
Travel to ZEISS offices throughout the U.S./Canada.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Scientific, Engineering, Safety and Environmental or technical discipline with 8+ years of relevant experience and 5+ years of direct supervision experience. Professional certifications preferred (OHSAS18001, ISO14001, ISO 45001, ISO9001 or similar accredited EHS management systems).
